anathema: Stay up all night without any breaks for sleeping or dreaming, attack a person or creature while they sleep, leave a badly wounded opponent alive and suffering, create undead or ask questions of the dead
edict: Learn about the night and prepare yourself to face its creatures and dangers, always make time for sleeping and dreams, ensure others never go to sleep scared
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Luhar (The Setting Sun)](/Deities.aspx?ID=679)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 18

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) This deity grants [_slither_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1676) instead of umbral journey_

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Learn about the night and prepare yourself to face its creatures and dangers, always make time for sleeping and dreams, ensure others never go to sleep scared

**Anathema** Stay up all night without any breaks for sleeping or dreaming, attack a person or creature while they sleep, leave a badly wounded opponent alive and suffering, create undead or ask questions of the dead

**Area of Concern**
Death, dreams, destiny

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48)

**Favored Weapon** [Spiked Chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=417)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=66), [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=69), [Dreams](/Domains.aspx?ID=72), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=92)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=118), [Star](/Domains.aspx?ID=119), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=1675)

- **3rd**
[Shared Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=2025)

- **5th**
[Umbral Journey](/Spells.aspx?ID=1729)

</column>
name: Luhar (The Setting Sun)
religious_symbol: Silver face in the setting sun
